entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Makkovik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -20.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Makkovik Airport 09:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -20.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -24.4°C
Wind: SW 24 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 18.
